description: The morning light fills the room; a gentle wrap on the door awakens our sweet Jasmine. Her soft feet patter on the carpet to the door where she discovers the special delivery - a box of bondage gear. She is still shy and hesitant to discipline her man like her other girlfriends have shown her so she decides to take a steaming shower first. But when she's interrupted by mini wanking to her wet, soapy, body, the flogger quickly takes the place of her inhibitions. A sensual blow job has mini screaming through his gag and just when he thinks the ropes are coming off and it's bacon and eggs for breakfast, Jasmine leads her little slave outside to crawl around like a dog in the grass before fucking his ass so hard his squeals still echo through the forest. This is part three of "Payback Week" and it just keeps getting hotter for the girls and harder for the boys. Enjoy!
title: mini and Jasmine Byrne
